articles.title: Bajaj Finance shares jump over 4% on Q3 updates - The Economic Times
articles.description: Bajaj Finance's deposit book stood at approximately Rs 58,000 crore as of 31 December 2023 as compared to Rs 42,984 crore in the year-ago period. This translates into a 35% growth year-on-year (YoY).
articles.content: Shares of Bajaj Finance jumped over 4% to the day's high of Rs 7,723.95 on the NSE in Thursdays trade after the company reported a 26% jump in new loans booked during the quarter ended December 31, 2… [+1883 chars]

articles.title: Tata Motors gets an upgrade from JPMorgan with the highest price target - CNBCTV18
articles.description: JPMorgan's revised price target implies a potential upside of 18.2% from Wednesday's closing levels for Tata Motors. This is also the highest price target for Tata Motors on the street by any analyst.
